about_the_game:
Agarest 2 - DLC Bundle #7


Unlock All Movie Galleries
This will unlock all of the movies in the game for your viewing pleasure. Enjoy!

Unlock All Galleries
This will unlock all the gallery items for viewing. Enjoy!

Additional Rough Gallery
This will unlock the rough gallery items for viewing. Enjoy!

Agarest 2 - DLC Bundle #7

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: 2.13GHz Intel Core2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible graphics card with 64Mb RAM and support for v3 shaders
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 3GHz Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible graphics card with 128Mb RAM and support for v3 shaders
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
